# Approval Record (Export Gate)

**Artifact:** Weekly Report Package  
**Run window:** YYYY-MM-DD → YYYY-MM-DD  
**Export scope:** Internal only / External share / Client delivery (choose one)

## Decision
- Status: Approved / Rejected
- Reviewer: Role/Team (optional)
- Timestamp: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
- Notes / conditions:
  - …

## What was approved (explicit)
- Executive Summary: Yes/No
- Backlog: Yes/No
- Change Log: Yes/No
- Coverage Report: Yes/No
- Evidence Index: Yes/No (usually internal only)

## Safe defaults
- No export by default unless explicitly approved.
